00085        * DeviceReq:
00086        *
00087        * The system and device access and services which the LoginHelper-implementing 
00088        * assistive technology requires in order to enable the user to use the system.
00089        *
00090        */

00098           AUDIO_IN, 
00099           NETWORK, 
00100           LOCALHOST, 
00101           SERIAL_OUT, 
00102           SERIAL_IN 
00103       };
